Android.description: Android mobile platform. Requires Android SDK

iOS.description: iOS mobile platform. Implemented via RoboVM.

LWJGL2.description: Older desktop platform utilizing the Lightweight Java Game Library. Use LWJGL3 for the latest support.

Headless.description: Headless platform. Has access to the core project. Useful for testing or setting up a server application.

HTML-GWT.description: GWT WebGL platform for distribution on web browsers. Supports only the Java language. Some extensions might not be compatible with GWT.

LWJGL3.description: Desktop platform utilizing the Lightweight Java Game Library featuring the latest support.

Shared.description: Code shared between core and server projects.
